amendment.description: To provide for increased support of survivors of deceased members of the uniformed services.

action.text: Amendment SA 3371, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3371 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3371 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S6951-6954; text: CR S6951-6952) To provide for increased support of survivors of deceased members of the uniformed services.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3371 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3371 proposed by Senator Sessions.
